org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.route.engine.validator

接口 ShardingStatementValidator<T extends org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.statement.SQLStatement>

  • 类型参数:
    T - type of SQL statement
    所有已知实现类:
    ShardingInsertStatementValidator, ShardingUpdateStatementValidator

    public interface ShardingStatementValidator<T extends org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.statement.SQLStatement>
    Sharding statement validator.
